text:
Hey there, I’m new to this but I’m working on a custom module that is using the hubdb row field.

Here’s my question, is there a way to filter what rows are shown when adding new rows?

What I’m trying to do is I have a db with ticket types for events. There will end up being dozens of events and hundreds of tickets. I’d like for the content creators to be able select the event first, then only have the tickets for that event shown. I have a column for the event on each ticket that I would be using to filter with.
